overview: Good eating, nice company and lots of sex - how could the evening possibly turn out any better? Four sexy women meet for dinner and share their most intimate secrets: Agathe seduces her daughter's young boyfriend, while Lise has never experienced the joy of having an orgasm - up until now that is...  Later we also join the gentlemen at their dinner as they share their stories of sex.  A fresh and original film with explicit scenes of sex - get ready for an evening that will be arousing, informative and entertaining!
title: Sex Stories
